body_html:
We have needed to carry a patch now and again for boringSSL, but they should all no longer be needed.
I do see the s390x patch was recently removed:
da3789c

We piggy-backed a change for ppc64le in there at one point, but again, that all should be merged in now.
@zjfheart Can you share more details on how you are building? (tf version, bazel version, config options enabled)

We have needed to carry a patch now and again for boringSSL, but they should all no longer be needed.
I do see the s390x patch was recently removed:
da3789c
We piggy-backed a change for ppc64le in there at one point, but again, that all should be merged in now.
@zjfheart Can you share more details on how you are building? (tf version, bazel version, config options enabled)
body:
We have needed to carry a patch now and again for boringSSL, but they should all no longer be needed. 
I do see the s390x patch was recently removed:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/da3789cd66290db7fbfc43d2c5091c4b0273fbdd

We piggy-backed a change for ppc64le in there at one point, but again, that all should be merged in now.
@zjfheart Can you share more details on how you are building? (tf version, bazel version, config options enabled)
